languages.text: "Теперь вам интересно мое мнение, {name} фон Валанциус?" {n}Голос Кассии дрожит от ярости.{/n} "Что ж, мой Дом достаточно настрадался — и от ошибок Тисифоны, и от вашей "дружбы". Пора раз и навсегда покончить с Атласом и освободиться".

traits.locale_text: "Теперь вам интересно мое мнение, {name} фон Валанциус?" {n}Голос Кассии дрожит от ярости.{/n} "Что ж, мой дом достаточно настрадался — и от ошибок Тисифоны, и от вашей "дружбы". Пора раз и навсегда покончить с Атласом и освободиться".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, now you are interested in my opinion, {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "Well, then, my House has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."
languages.original_text: "Теперь вам интересно мое мнение, {name} фон Валанциус?" {n}Голос Кассии дрожит от ярости.{/n} "Что ж, мой Дом достаточно настрадался — и от ошибок Тисифоны, и от вашей "дружбы". Пора раз и навсегда покончить с Атласом и освободиться".

My House has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. It is time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, now you are interested in my opinion, {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassia's voice shakes with fury.{/n} "Well, then. My House has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. It is time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, now you are interested in my opinion, {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "Well, then, my House has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あら、あたくしの意見に興味があるのですか、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様？」{n}カシアの声は怒りで震えている。{/n}「ええ、では、わが家はティシフォンの過ちとあなたとの『提携』のどちらにも十分苦しめられてきました。今こそアトラスを永遠に捨て、自由になる時が来たのです」
languages.original_text: "Oh, now you are interested in my opinion, {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "Well, then, my House has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: 「あら、あたくしの意見に興味があるのですか、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様？」{n}カシアの声は怒りで震えている。{/n}「ええ、では、わが家はティシフォンの過ちとあなたとの『提携』のどちらにも十分苦しめられてきました。今こそアトラスを永遠に捨て、自由になる時が来たのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “噢，你现在倒是对我的意见感兴趣了，是吗，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯？”{n}卡西娅的声音颤抖着，愤怒不已。{/n}“很好，既然如此，我认为奥赛罗家族已经受了太久的苦，无论是提西福涅的罪行，还是与你之间的‘联盟’。是时候彻底摧毁圣仪，让我们重获自由了。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, now you are interested in my opinion, {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "Well, then, my House has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: “噢，你现在倒是对我的意见感兴趣了，是吗，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯？”{n}卡西娅的声音颤抖着，愤怒不已。{/n}“很好，既然如此，我认为奥塞罗家族已经受了太久的苦，无论是提西福涅的罪行，还是与你之间的‘联盟’。是时候彻底摧毁圣仪，让我们重获自由了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, alors maintenant, mon opinion vous intéresse, {name} von Valancius ? »{n}La voix de Cassia tremble de fureur.{/n} « Dans ce cas, laissez-moi vous dire que ma maison a bien assez souffert, aussi bien des erreurs de Tisiphone que de sa soi-disant alliance avec vous. Il est grand temps pour nous de retrouver notre liberté. L'Atlas doit être détruit. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, now you are interested in my opinion, {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "Well, then, my House has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, alors maintenant, mon opinion vous intéresse, {name} von Valancius ? »{n}La voix de Cassia tremble de fureur.{/n} « Dans ce cas, laissez-moi vous dire que ma maison a bien assez souffert, aussi bien des erreurs de Tisiphone que de sa soi-disant alliance avec vous. Il est grand temps pour nous de retrouver notre liberté. L'Atlas doit être détruit. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Oh, ¿ahora le interesa mi opinión, {name} von Valancius?». {n}La voz de Cassia tiembla de furia.{/n} «En ese caso, diré que mi casa ya ha sufrido más que suficiente, tanto por los errores de Tisiphone como por su "alianza" con usted. Es hora de que nos deshagamos del Atlas de una vez por todas y quedemos libres de esa maldad».
languages.original_text: "Oh, now you are interested in my opinion, {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "Well, then, my House has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, ¿ahora le interesa mi opinión, {name} von Valancius?». {n}La voz de Cassia tiembla de furia.{/n} «En ese caso, diré que mi casa ya ha sufrido más que suficiente, tanto por los errores de Tisiphone como por su "alianza" con usted. Es hora de que nos deshagamos del Atlas de una vez por todas y quedemos libres de esa maldad».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ach, jetzt interessiert Euch meine Meinung, {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassias Stimme bebt vor Wut.{/n} "Nun, mein Haus hat lang genug gelitten, sowohl durch Tisiphones Fehlern als auch durch sein 'Bündnis' mit Euch. Es wird höchste Zeit, dass wir den Atlas vernichten und uns endlich ein für alle Mal befreien."
languages.original_text: "Oh, now you are interested in my opinion, {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "Well, then, my House has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, jetzt interessiert Euch meine Meinung, {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassias Stimme bebt vor Wut.{/n} "Nun, mein Haus hat lang genug gelitten, sowohl durch Tisiphones Fehlern als auch durch sein 'Bündnis' mit Euch. Es wird höchste Zeit, dass wir den Atlas vernichten und uns endlich ein für alle Mal befreien."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Artık fikrim değer mi kazandı {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassia'nın sesi, öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "Peki o hâlde. Hanem, hem Tisiphone'nin hatalarından hem de seninle 'ittifakımızdan' çok çekti. Atlas'tan kalıcı olarak kurtulup sonunda özgür kalmamızın vakti geldi de geçiyor."
languages.original_text: "Oh, now you are interested in my opinion, {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "Well, then, my House has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: "Artık fikrim değer mi kazandı {name} von Valancius?" {n}Cassia'nın sesi, öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "Peki o hâlde. Hanem, hem Tisiphone'nin hatalarından hem de seninle 'ittifakımız'dan çok çekti. Atlas'tan kalıcı olarak kurtulup sonunda özgür kalmamızın vakti geldi de geçiyor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
